you go get the ingred ingredients and
then you know you make the dish the

and that's the interesting part of it so
it's not really a question of this is

am I what kinds of things turn me on
what kind of things you know that that I
just will not do because it goes against

they know what they know and very often

Through in deciding what to do with what

100,000 200,000 a year who leave and

they're not really saying you know what
I'm making 200 100,000 today but I

they think you know what this looks like

they don't go and say you know here's

Gadget G and this gadget G is going to

what they really do is they are very

Gadget G they allow you to change their

this stakeholder thing in a very
interesting way so what happens is since
each person is putting real skin in the
game and they're deciding what to put in

much that they're willing to lose so the

one hand if you fail it keeps failures
